General.Name: San Lorenzo Gold Corp
General.Description: San Lorenzo Gold Corp., an exploration company, acquires and develops mineral properties in Chile. It primarily explores for copper and gold. Its flagship property is 100% interest hold in the Salvadora project that covers an area of 8,796 hectares located in the Province of Chañaral, III Region, Chile. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 903 - 8th Avenue South West, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0P7

1.Name: Mr. Terence  Walker M.Sc, M.Sc., P.Geo.
1.Title: VP of Exploration & Director
